tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

"Wait wait wait, Everything gay? You do know I only used it in"Gaycraft",Right?"MOVING SUBJECT."Get your facts straight first of allAnd the majority of people that play Gaycraft. are under the age of 12."Whared you get that the internet?GET﻿ YOUR FACTS STRAIT minecraft has an equal amount of children and adults."Thank you sir, for reading my comment at your 1st Grade reading level.I'm sure you will get your 5 min back momentarily, standby." Wow. im not even going to say...oh look out of char...
name of song﻿ please?
lol what?﻿
lol maybe﻿
Love the last﻿ trick
tums up if you﻿ like this video
BEST TROLL﻿ EVER
I am proud﻿ to count you among the few on this website who are not immature.
These bets﻿ are great,﻿ but theres a problem, I don't own anything...
Last﻿ trick is the ultimate troll. XDDDD
These bets are great, but theres a problem, I don't﻿ have friends...
Are you my long lost brother or﻿ something?
how the fuck should i know﻿ i was bored
I love﻿ the last one！
whats﻿ the liquid?
Will it work﻿ with a dollar?
Oh and i fergot to mention... CoD and Mw3 (saying someone who hasent played, just seen) are like the same game! the point﻿ still stands!
That liquid looks like poison. In﻿ my head I imagined someone dying in one of these bets.
God I love this guys﻿ accent.
perhaps lemonade or colored﻿ water
i Did last one to my brother and he drink all water and he beat the shit﻿ out of me
why did you jump into that argument the two would of ended up fucking if you left them ....good job breaking up the fight ._.﻿

Reviewer.Books: dont really read much. the only books i really have enjoyed are the harry potter series, the series of unfortunate events, and some dave barry. and occasionaly the Bible when i need to. not often tho.. more than half the time i dont know what anything i just read out of it even meant
Reviewer.Movies: iRobot! will smith is pwnage. so is johny depp, jackie chan, and george lopez
Reviewer.Music: The Showdown, my favorite genre is metal (favorite metal subgenre is southern metal) but i love almost all genres. another favorite is drum 'n' bass. my favorite drum 'n' bass band is NOISIA. i enjoy music thats true.
Anything completely strange and completely off-topic, not real music.
